top_places_canada.name: Banff National Park
top_places_canada.description: A stunning national park located in the Canadian Rockies known for its beautiful landscapes and diverse wildlife.

top_places_canada.name: Niagara Falls
top_places_canada.description: A breathtaking waterfall located on the border of Ontario, Canada, and New York, USA.

top_places_canada.name: CN Tower
top_places_canada.description: An iconic tower in downtown Toronto, offering a panoramic view of the city and surrounding area.

top_places_canada.name: Prince Edward Island
top_places_canada.description: A beautiful island known for its beaches, rolling hills, and red sandstone cliffs.

top_places_canada.name: Montmorency Falls
top_places_canada.description: A large waterfall located near Quebec City, offering stunning views and scenic trails.
